about_the_game:
Game Background
This is an RPG simulation game
You will become our protagonist - a conscious zombie
Because they are infected with the zombie virus, once discovered, they will be killed by humans
So in order to escape humanity
Coming to an island alone
However, this island has many unknown dangers
So can you survive on the island
-----
Game gameplay
As a zombie, how do you learn to survive on your own?
You must take care of yourself.
For example,
Construction: You must collect various materials to build your own hut
Planting: Planting food to survive
Fishing: Who says zombies cannot fish?
Combat: For your own survival, eliminate dangerous creatures on the island
More dangers await you to experience

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes the nudity of the character's body, as well as exposed clothing, breast shakes, hip shakes and other body physical effects.

name: I Am Zombie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10 64bit
  • Processor: i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3060 12G
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!
